works.title: Asset consulting Website

Included features are form submission, stripe payment, user authentication and more. Only core HTML is been used for this website fronte-end development since client wanted to keep it SEO friendly. In additon to that, Express.js rest API used to build API from scratch alogn with MongoDB Database

works.title: Peer To Peer File sharing
works.desc: This website is used for two diffrent purpose, first and foremost, user can share file without uploading it to a server, it is peer to peer file sharing using WebRTC Technology. In addition to that, Socket.io is been used to transfer signal of WebRTC. Secondly, this website can be used to make URL of a website short.
